backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI asset additions, category updates, and gallery sections with associated files and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components, pages, and content modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling routing via a custom router and rendering Header, Footer, and current page.
frontend/src/branding/theme.ts: Brand configuration exporting name, logo path, and teal/green OKLCH color palette.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: UI card component that displays a category photo, icon with fallback, title, and description with hover effects and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetails.t: Component rendering phone, email, and address in compact or detailed layouts using shared contact data.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand info, quick navigation, compact contact details, and attribution link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with scroll‑based styling, navigation links, mobile menu, and router-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, and buttons for contact navigation and phone call.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Responsive image grid that hides images failing to load using error tracking state.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with fallback rendering if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper component providing a padded section with container layout.
frontend/src/content/categories.ts: Defines product categories with metadata including icons, photos, and descriptions.
frontend/src/content/contact.ts: Static contact information object containing phone, email, and address.
frontend/src/content/icuSetup.ts: Lists ICU setup requirement groups with detailed equipment, furniture, and construction items.
frontend/src/content/otSetup.ts: Provides a list of basic OT setup requirement items.
frontend/src/content/productGalleries.ts: Exports image galleries for hospital furniture and laboratory setups.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and typography styling.
frontend/src/lib/router.ts: Simple client-side router using the History API with subscription-based route change notifications.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page describing the company’s services, quality focus, and expertise with icon sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with a header and detailed contact information inside a styled Section component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage containing only the Hero component.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows product categories, ICU and OT setup requirement lists, and product galleries using multiple Section components and mapped content arrays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, issues, and needed assets for building the multi‑page Predicta Healthcare website.
